description:
Lum`s dad finds himself in the doghouse and on the Moroboshis` couch. Can he patch things up with his wife before he eats his hosts out of house and home?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Is a Husband & Wife Quarrel Survival of the Fittest?
Un homme doit savoir se montrer dur
夫婦げんか 食うか食われるか!?
